text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem brain-imaging-type-cs

This code system http://tecnomod-um.org/CodeSystem/brain-imaging-type-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
ct-cta CT-CTAComputed Tomography (CT) and CT Angiography (CTA)
ct-cta-perfusion CT-CTA and PerfusionComputed Tomography (CT), CT Angiography (CTA), and CT Perfusion
mr-dwi-flair MR DWI-FLAIRMagnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR)
mr-dwi-flair-mra MR DWI-FLAIR and MRAMagnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), and Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA)
mr-dwi-flair-mra-perfusion MR DWI-FLAIR, MRA, and PerfusionMagnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) and Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA), and MR Perfusion

name: BrainImagingTypeCS
title: Brain Imaging Type Code System
description: Codes specifying the type of brain imaging performed (e.g., CT, MRI).

concept.definition: Computed Tomography (CT), CT Angiography (CTA), and CT Perfusion
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR)
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) or Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), and Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA)
Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) with Diffusion-Weighted Imaging (DWI) and Fluid-Attenuated Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), Magnetic Resonance Angiography (MRA), and MR Perfusion
